text: Pierre Lhomme (5 April 1930 – 4 July 2019) was a French cinematographer. He was known for his works were Cyrano de Bergerac, Lovers Like Us and Deadly Circuit. Lhomme was born in Boulogne-Billancourt, France. He retired in 2003.
